title: Spontaneous Transformation Technique – June 2, 2018 REPLAY
content: What an amazing sacred conversation and resulting healing from our STT Session.    You are about to discover ways to fill up and overcome stress… a powerful life-changing exercise that, when applied, can change just about everything.    AND you will explore what your core energy is.    When you know your core, you gain strength and confidence.    When you understand who you really are, you have more capacity for what you want to arrive and be embraced.    When you truly know yourself, you now have compassion for others and the dynamics of relationship can truly transform.    This one’s a keeper.     Replay:      DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS:    PC Users: Just right-click on the link and choose “Save Link/Save Target As” then save the file to the desired location on your computer.    Mac Users: Hold Ctrl and click on the “Download” link then choose “Save File As” and save it to the desired location on your computer.     ABOUT THE SPONTANEOUS TRANSFORMATION TECHNIQUE CALLS:    Jennifer will take you on a soul journey to discover the areas within you that are ready to be released. Join her to experience deep healing using her own Spontaneous Transformation Technique (which originated as Body Dialoging and is covered in Joe Vitale’s Book The Key) plus her Sound Vibration Soul Songs and Tonal Healing.    She will be taking calls and chat questions and working with individuals for group healing. If you are looking to shift, this is the call for you!    GET READY TO SHIFT!
contentWithMarkup:
What an amazing sacred conversation and resulting healing from our STT Session.

You are about to discover ways to fill up and overcome stress… a powerful life-changing exercise that, when applied, can change just about everything.

AND you will explore what your core energy is.

When you know your core, you gain strength and confidence.

When you understand who you really are, you have more capacity for what you want to arrive and be embraced.

When you truly know yourself, you now have compassion for others and the dynamics of relationship can truly transform.

This one’s a keeper.

Replay:

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS:

PC Users: Just right-click on the link and choose “Save Link/Save Target As” then save the file to the desired location on your computer.

Mac Users: Hold Ctrl and click on the “Download” link then choose “Save File As” and save it to the desired location on your computer.

ABOUT THE SPONTANEOUS TRANSFORMATION TECHNIQUE CALLS:

Jennifer will take you on a soul journey to discover the areas within you that are ready to be released. Join her to experience deep healing using her own Spontaneous Transformation Technique (which originated as Body Dialoging and is covered in Joe Vitale’s Book The Key) plus her Sound Vibration Soul Songs and Tonal Healing.

She will be taking calls and chat questions and working with individuals for group healing. If you are looking to shift, this is the call for you!

GET READY TO SHIFT!
